caption.p: SEM images and EDS mapping of bare Zn electrode a before and b, c after 100 stripping/plating cycles, ZIF-8@Zn electrode d before, and e, f after 100 stripping/plating cycles. g Schematic illustration for morphology change of the bare Zn foil and ZIF-8@Zn electrodes during repeated Zn stripping/plating processes
